app_name: Guess the Movie from Picture or Poster â€” Quiz Game
app_detail:
Do you remember posters of your favorite movies? Will you be able to guess by the poster such cult movies like "The Terminator", "The Godfather", "Taxi Driver", "Pulp Fiction"? Can you guess current movies or TV shows, for example, "La La Land", "The Avengers" or "Peaky Blinders"? Will you guess what the film is in front of you by the actors on the poster? Will you remember the name of the cartoon character on the image?

This quiz is a real catch for any cinephile! 750 movies, cartoons and TV series, 50 interesting levels, classic movies and current movies of different genres and countries of production â€” all are in one application.

Do you want to be known as a real film expert? Complete this game 100%: earn coins, go to the app every day for taking bonuses, spend them on hints, unlock new levels and guess all the movies.

Are you tired of the main game mode or have you passed it completely? Then play additional mini-games and compete with other gamers:

â–¸ Arcade. In this game you need to open the poster by parts. As quickly as possible guess what the film is hidden behind the squares. The fewer pieces you will unlock, the more points you will get.
â–¸ Guess the Movie. The game shows a poster and several answers. You have to choose the right one.
â–¸ True or False. On the screen you can see the name of the movie. You need to answer whether the poster matches this film or not.

ğŸ¥ Movie quiz features ğŸ¥

â˜… 750 films, series and cartoons of various genres, countries and years of release.
â˜… 50 interesting levels.
â˜… Main mode + 3 mini-games. In the application you will always have something to do.
â˜… If you want to know more about the guessed movie or if you found some movie whose poster you are interested, and you want to watch it, the application has a button which will open you IMDB with information about the movie, where you can learn more about it.
â˜… Earn coins by guessing movies and levels and visiting the app every day. Via coins you can buy hints that will help in difficult situations.
â˜… Do you want to compete with a friend or other players? Earn the most number of points in mini-games and get the first place!
â˜… Game statistics. You will always know how many percent of the game you have passed, and how many movies you have to guess.
â˜… The app is available in 6 languages: English, German, French, Spanish, Italian and Russian.
â˜… Intuitive, simple and beautiful interface.
â˜… The application works on smartphones and tablets.

This product uses the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb.
